statements: SELECT * FROM TortureReports WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT report_date, location, description FROM TortureReports WHERE location = 'Prison';
SELECT victim_name, perpetrator_name FROM TortureReports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM TortureReports LIMIT 3;
SELECT report_id, location FROM TortureReports WHERE perpetrator_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM TortureReports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT report_date, location, victim_name FROM TortureReports WHERE perpetrator_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT report_id, description FROM TortureReports ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT * FROM TortureReports WHERE location LIKE '%prison%' AND victim_name IS NOT NULL
SELECT perpetrator_name, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM TortureReports GROUP BY perpetrator_name HAVING total_reports > 1
SELECT * FROM TortureReports;
SELECT report_id, description, report_date, location FROM TortureReports;
SELECT * FROM TortureAnalytics WHERE report_id = 10;
SELECT findings, analysis_date FROM TortureAnalytics WHERE analysis_id = 5;
SELECT report_id, description FROM TortureReports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM TortureReports WHERE location = 'Guantanamo Bay' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, description FROM TortureReports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY report_date ASC;

SELECT r.report_id, r.location, a.analysis_date, a.findings FROM TortureReports r INNER JOIN TortureAnalytics a ON r.report_id = a.report_id WHERE a.findings LIKE '%torture%' ORDER BY a.analysis_date DESC;

SELECT r.report_id, r.report_date, a.analysis_id, a.analysis_date FROM TortureReports r LEFT JOIN TortureAnalytics a ON r.report_id = a.report_id WHERE a.analysis_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY r.report_id ASC;

SELECT r.report_id, r.location, a.analysis_id, a.findings FROM TortureReports r RIGHT JOIN TortureAnalytics a ON r.report_id = a.report_id WHERE r.report_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY r.report_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Incident
SELECT location, date FROM Incident ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT id, description FROM Incident WHERE id = 3
SELECT * FROM Perpetrator WHERE age > 25
SELECT name, gender FROM Perpetrator WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT description, date, location, id FROM Incident WHERE id = 1
SELECT name, age, gender, id FROM Perpetrator WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT id, name, nationality, age FROM Victim WHERE nationality = 'USA' AND age BETWEEN 20 AND 30
SELECT * FROM Perpetrator p INNER JOIN Incident i ON p.id = i.id WHERE p.name = 'John Doe'
SELECT id, location, date FROM Incident WHERE location IN ('New York', 'Los Angeles')
SELECT * FROM TortureReports;
SELECT report_id, location, description FROM TortureReports;
SELECT victim_name, age, gender FROM VictimDetails WHERE age > 18;
SELECT perpetrator_name, affiliation FROM Perpetrators WHERE affiliation = 'Government';
SELECT report_id, severity, risk_rating FROM IncidentAnalysis WHERE severity = 'High';
SELECT * FROM TortureReports;
SELECT victim_name, age, gender FROM VictimDetails ORDER BY age DESC;

SELECT torture.report_id, location, perpetrator_name, risk_rating FROM TortureReports AS torture JOIN Perpetrators AS perpetrator ON torture.report_id = perpetrator.report_id JOIN IncidentAnalysis AS analysis ON torture.report_id = analysis.report_id WHERE analysis.severity = 'High';
SELECT report_id, location FROM TortureReports WHERE incident_date >= '2022-01-01' AND incident_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT DISTINCT perpetrator_name, affiliation FROM Perpetrators;
SELECT * FROM TortureReports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT victim_name, age, nationality FROM VictimDetails WHERE age > 30;
SELECT perpetrator_name, age, description FROM PerpetratorDetails WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM IncidentLocation WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT strategy_name, impact_analysis FROM PreventionStrategies ORDER BY effectiveness_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM TortureReports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT victim_name, perpetrator_name, description FROM TortureReports WHERE report_id BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000 ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM IncidentLocation WHERE country = 'USA' LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM VictimDetails JOIN PerpetratorDetails ON VictimDetails.victim_name = PerpetratorDetails.perpetrator_name
SELECT strategy_name, description, effectiveness_rating FROM PreventionStrategies WHERE impact_analysis LIKE '%positive%'
